title: Jewellery designer Roxanne First shares her tips for an effortless working wardrobe
text:
The jewellery designer, beloved of the fashion set, pairs comfortable jeans and trainers with a daily smattering of diamonds...

The perfect jewellery is the sort you can wear all the time.

My parents gave me a diamond tennis bracelet [a bejewelled flexible bracelet] seven or eight years ago and it’s never come off my wrist. Something like that can seem quite old-school, like a lady with her pearls, but wearing one with a white T-shirt and blue jeans (I love the brand Agolde’s) looks so chic. It’s a piece that never dates and that you can wear every day. Or every night – I go to sleep in my jewellery and wake up in my jewellery. Then I add some more.

I’m inspired by the way Italian women wear...
